summary.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

span.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项是节点或一个原子值。An item is either a node or an atomic value.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

value.span: 作为最合适的装箱对象的当前项 [！INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 类型。

span.span: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果项的值不符合其指定架构类型的值属性的值等效属性。If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the property is equivalent to the value of the property. 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

returns.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中重写时方法尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定类型。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified. 对象用于解析与类型转换有关的命名空间前缀。The object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. 例如，转换时`xs:QName`到`xs:string`。For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`. 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性尝试将项的值转换[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]根据 XPath 2.0 规则项的类型强制转换的类型。The property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type. 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中重写时属性可以获取[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的项的类型化值的类型。When overridden in a derived class, the property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item. 例如，类型的元素`xs:int`都的默认情况下。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 但是，可能是任何一种可以映射到有效类型`xs:int`，如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 有关类型的详细信息，支持在命名空间，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

span.para: 所有的实施者必须提供属性的每个项，即使它只是。
All implementers must provide a property for every item, even if it is only .
